Sentencas: Power generation experiments were carried out to investigate the effective anode thickness and to clarify the mechanism determining the threshold current density for CO2 production.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel

Sentencas: The production of CO2 increased fuel efficiency and reduced anode overpotential.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel

Sentencas: The effect of anode thickness, diameter of NiO powder for anode, concentration of fuel and operating temperature on anode potential and outlet gas composition were measured in this report.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel

Sentencas: The anode overpotential decreased with increasing anode thickness up to 120 mu m for pure hydrogen fuel and 70 mu m for 4.6% of methane fuel.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel

Sentencas: The result indicated that the effective three phase boundary could be distributed from the electrolyte surface into the anode to a depth of 120 mu m for hydrogen fuel and 70 mu m for methane fuel.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel

Sentencas: The threshold current density was explained by the surface activity with fuel on the three phase boundary.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel

Sentencas: The modelling of the anode reaction by a complete mixing reactor consistently interpreted all experimental results.
Titulo: Oxidation mechanism and effective anode thickness of SOFC for dry methane fuel
